A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: without doubt the worst  SW movie ever made. Unbelievably bad story\, unbalanced \, cringworthy is some parts and the Anti-trump SJW narrative throughout the movie was nothing short of insulting to the SW legacy. I  Have seen the movie x 3 in a hope it might get better but  its only confirmed how completely rubbish it is.  Rian Johnson and Disney have stated they want to take SW in a different direction but I think thats a  Copout \, they have simply made a crap movie using a crap storyline . For the first time in 40years I wont be paying to go see a SW movie when Ep9 is released. As a result my kids are no longer interested in SW so the 'legacy' stops at EP8 for our family.
